media:group.media:title: The EVANGELION DILEMMA
media:group.media:description: What does Hideaki Anno do when his small niche robot show becomes an international powerhouse anime? todays preview is all about NEON GENESIS EVANGELION, hopefully the full anno retrospective will be out soon. https://www.gofundme.com/f/translating-hideaki-annos-kare-kano-interviews Follow me on Twitter for Updates on Videos- https://twitter.com/the_stevem SUPPORT ME HERE- https://www.patreon.com/stevemmmmm AND HERE - paypal.me/stevemmmmm All Sources In the Pinned Comments #neongenesisevangelion #hideakianno #gainax 00:00 intro 00:31 NOT BANDAI (Pause and Select Cameo) 01:21 EVA Section 9:49 The Shinji Hate Montage 11:06 Michael Bay's Gambit 15:16 Anno's Breakdown 17:18 My Animation 18:38 Support the Project! 20:44 kot special thanks to @Pause and Select & @Scheming Fox & @Caribou-kun for voicing and cameoing in the video

entry.title: The Rise and FALL of STUDIO 4℃

media:group.media:title: The Rise and FALL of STUDIO 4℃
media:group.media:description:
Revised and expanded from 4cember this is the full history of anime company studio 4c from Katsuhiro Otomo to Eiko Tanaka. Warning Flashing Images early on, more info in the timecodes.
